snippet: Bill Shuster of the House Committee on Transportation and the head of JetBlue disagree with an editorial.
abstract: Letter from Rep Bill Shuster, chairman of House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure, comments on Feb 15 editorial arguing against privatization of air traffic control.
lead_paragraph: Bill Shuster of the House Committee on Transportation and the head of JetBlue disagree with an editorial.

headline.print_headline: Does Air Traffic Control Need an Overhaul?
headline.main: Does Air Traffic Control Need an Overhaul?
